Posts.Content: DirtyBird101 wrote: I was wondering if anyone was on that has had a needle biopsy. I have one scheduled for Friday and am worried about the pain. I have talked to a lady at work today and she said the pain was horrible. I am terrified of needles (and not much of a lover of pain), all I know is they inject Novacain prior to doing it. I have a problem with the dentist & receiving enough to numb my gums for dental work. (It might not be Novacain ... The doctor just said something is injected to numb the area). What was the pain like? Do I need to get something to calm me down prior to the test? I am so scared ... Both of the test and the results. Also, how long is the needle part? And how long did it take to get results? The report said (ultrasound) that mine was .5 cm x .5 cm x .6 cm about 3 cm from my nipple, irregular shaped. I am so scared Log in to post a reply
